question_text:
Question 33 
[Structural Analysis : Determinacy & Indeterminacy (Static & Kinematic)] 
 
The plane frame shown in the figure has fixed support at joint A, hinge support at joint F, and roller 
support at joint I.  In the figure, 
A
  to I indicate joints of the frame.
If the axial deformations are neglected, the degree of kinematic indeterminacy is _______ (in integer). 
Ans. 9 to 9
